author: wsmoak
msg: Removed MyFaces Listener from web.xml as it is no longer needed in version 1.1.
Made cancel button immediate so it will skip validation.

author: wsmoak
msg: Added Maven build files for the mailreader example webapp.

author: ekoneil
msg: Fix for BEEHIVE-994.  This adds the appropriate property value encoding for the client manifest file; the implementation follows the rules defined for the Properties.store() method.
Since this .properties file is encoded through APT, it's not possible to use the Properties.store method, which would encode these name / value pairs automatically.
The original patch included a test, but the test can't be added since it breaks the build (without setting a special encoding) on win32.  Need to look at that further at some point...

author: karl
msg: * rivet/packages/dio/dio.tcl: Add new "update" method that works
just like "store" except that it assumes you're doing an update
and, unlike store, does not check to see if the row is already
Also modified the "store" method, when doing an update, to not
attempt to change row fields that are specified in the where clause.
* doc/rivet.xml: Documented all undocumented public DIO methods, such
as count, db, forall, interface, insert, makekey, quote, search
